mapper.select: SELECT ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians(#{gpsLat}) ) * cos( radians(lat) ) * cos( radians(lng) - radians(#{gpsLng}) ) + sin( radians(#{gpsLat}) ) * sin( radians(lat) ) ) ) AS distance, GUBUN, SEQ, PARKING_NM, PARKING_PART, PARKING_TYPE, LOCPLC_LOTNO_ADDR, LOCPLC_ROADNM_ADDR, P_PAY, CONTACT, LAT, LNG FROM PARKING_TB HAVING distance < 5 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0 , 10
SELECT CMT_SEQ, SEQ, GUBUN, CMT_GRADE, CMT_DT, CMT_CONTENT, CMT_ID FROM COMMENT_TB WHERE GUBUN='parkingdata' AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_TB ( SEQ, GUBUN, CMT_GRADE, CMT_DT, CMT_CONTENT, CMT_ID ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{gubun}, '', now(), #{cmt_content}, #{cmt_id} )
